source.author: Aston, H.I.
source.title: Villarsia
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria Dicotyledons Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Aston, H.I. (1999). Villarsia. In: Walsh, N.G., Entwisle, T.J., Flora of Victoria Dicotyledons Cornaceae to Asteraceae 4, pp. 382-385. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Plants stoloniferous; leaf-blades usually floating and strongly dorsiventral; inflorescence stems robust and more or less erect; mature capsules on erect pedicels
Plants not stoloniferous; leaf-blades usually erect to reclining and not markedly dorsiventral; inflorescence stems lax and spreading; mature capsules on recurved pedicels
